description: Made from recycled polyester and repurposed taffeta, the Cálido Vest doesn’t just bring the heat—it brings the sustainability, too. This versatile, fully-reversible staple style is packable and comes in creative color combos.
name: Cotopaxi Teca Calido Reversible Vest - Mens

specs.value: repurposed polyester taffeta with DWR finish and 600 mm PU backer
